Here is the rewritten review:
Title: BOSH!: Simple Recipes * Amazing Food *
Categories: Books, Cooking by Ingredient
Rating 5 out of five stars

I was blown away when I first tried this book. The recipes are incredibly simple and easy to follow - even for a beginner like me! My favorite part has been experimenting with new ingredients that were previously unknown in my kitchen.

The author's use [ASPECT_1] makes it so much easier than traditional cooking methods while still maintaining flavor.
[ISSUE_2]: Some readers have complained about using pre-made mixes or store-bought products as substitutes; however some reviewers suggest adding their own spices & herbs which can be found at most grocery stores

This book is a [TYPE]. Customers praise its simple recipes and beautiful pictures, but some complain about the lack of ingredients in each recipe."
The product has been praised for being easy to follow.
